title: Is it possible to aim in video games with your eye like eye tracking? - Quora

response.answer_text: Eye tracking in games Eye tracking in gaming is a game-changer, but not a replacement. Just as your hands operate the mouse, gamepad, and keyboard - your eye movement is now also a source of input. Natural actions and reactions like aiming, taking cover, or panning your gaze are now possible with minimal effort.

How do you think those pro gamers play? When I saw their plays, I realized that my sensors are way inferior to them. They killed an opponent who wasn’t detected by my vision in a flick shot and they did it over and over. I call it instant eye tracking.
